name: The Dying Light! (no, not that one)
name_original: The Dying Light! (no, not that one)
description:
You are in great danger! The line between fiction and reality is at its weakest point. Your task is to perform some rituals in order to thicken that barrier and restore order. Run, keep all of the candles lit, and don't run into the portals!

Make sure that you light the unlit candles and beat your high score!!!

CONTROLS:

W,A,S,D ~ MOVE

E ~ INTERACT

J/L ~ HIGHER OR LOWER MOUSE SENSITIVITY

CREDITS:
